knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
us_19 <- read_csv('~/df_data/US/us_19.csv')
#glimpse(us_19)
```

```{r}
## full model 
full_model <- lm(DAST_CAT ~ BHYD_NMU + BUP_NMU + COD_NMU + DIHY_NMU + ELU_NMU + FENT_NMU + GAB_NMU + HYD_NMU + HYDM_NMU + KTM_NMU + METH_NMU + MORPH_NMU + OXY_NMU + OXYM_NMU + PREG_NMU + SUF_NMU + TAP_NMU + TRAM_NMU, data = us_19)

tidy(full_model)
```

```{r}
## model selection using step() function
selected_model <- step(full_model, direction = "backward")
```
